org.anchoranalysis.image.io.stack.input

Class MaskReader

  • Object
    • MaskReader

  • public class MaskReader
extends Object
    Utility functions for reading a Mask from the file-system.
    Author:
    Owen Feehan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Mask openMask(StackReader stackReader, Path path, BinaryValuesInt binaryValues, Logger logger)
      Utility functions for opening a single-channeled stack as a Mask.

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • openMask

        public static Mask openMask(StackReader stackReader,
                            Path path,
                            BinaryValuesInt binaryValues,
                            Logger logger)
                     throws ImageIOException
        Utility functions for opening a single-channeled stack as a Mask.
        Parameters:
        stackReader - the raster-reader for reading the stack.
        path - the path the raster is located at.
        binaryValues - what constitutes on and off voxels in the raster.
        logger - where to write informative messages to, and and any non-fatal errors (fatal errors are throw as exceptions).
        Returns:
        a newly created Mask as read from the file-system.
        Throws:
        ImageIOException - if the underlying image cannot be successfully read from the file-system.
